sources.title: Dark Alibi (1946) DVD MKV
sources.description: DVD remux of the 1946 Monogram Pictures film "Dark Alibi." IMDb TMDB Wikipedia Dark Alibi is a 1946 American mystery film directed by Phil Karlson featuring Sidney Toler as Charlie Chan. It is also known as Charlie Chan in Alcatraz, Fatal Fingerprints and Fatal Fingertips.

metadata.Plot: Three men are convicted of bank robberies, the main evidence against them being that their fingerprints were found at the scenes. However, Charlie Chan believes them to be innocent, and his investigation reveals that they are indeed innocent and that their fingerprints were forged and planted in the prison files to frame them. Charlie sets out to uncover the real bank robbers.
metadata.Actors: Sidney Toler, Mantan Moreland, Ben Carter
